txt.en: 'It is not for neglect, rather it is because I know the enmity and danger that exists should we not address the enemies that would bring harm to the forest. Your sapling is growing and will one day need to be returned to the place where it was found. But, friend, there are enemies in these lands beyond the forces out of the north.'
With your effort to thin the numbers in the Darktide pack complete, you should return to Fanalir and let her know of your efforts.
Fanalir fears that the enmity of the wolves will threaten your sapling as they threaten the fauna in the forest. She begs that you thin out their number.
'The Darktide wolves make the southern forests of the Ettenmoors their home. You will find them roaming throughout Hithlad. Go there and thin their number, please.'
'Though this may seem a truly selfish request, friend, it is for the better future we wish for all.'
You have defeated a Darktide wolf ([placeholder]/14)
Fanalir wants to help secure the future of the forests in the Ettenmoors by culling the Darktide wolves from the woods.
